label.phrase: we're delighted for this recognition as we feel the experience ideo helped shimano create has achieved shimano's goal of getting more people on bikes

we started with a reference design of what we thought the bicycle should look like and after showing it to bicycle manufacturers and working closely with shimano we ultimately created a new category in the bicycle industry that has been well received
